HOME.WELCOME_SUB_TITLE: You are now ready to manage your patients.

LIST.TITLE: My Providers
LIST.WARNING: OK! You must add at least two contacts before sharing your health information.

DELETE_DIALOG.TITLE: Delete provider
DELETE_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this provider?

STEP_1.TITLE: Step 1. Please enter the provider State and City or Zip Code.
STEP_1.LABEL: PLEASE CHOOSE ONE.

STATE_AND_CITY.LABEL: Enter State and City
STATE_AND_CITY.CITY_MIN_LENGTH_ERROR_MSG: Must be at least 2 characters long.

STEP_2.TITLE: Step 2. Please enter the provider Facility Name OR Provider Name and Other Criteria.
STEP_2.LABEL: PLEASE CHOOSE ONE.

PROVIDER_NAME_AND_OTHERS.LABEL: Enter Provider Name and Other Criteria
PROVIDER_NAME_AND_OTHERS.LAST_NAME_MIN_LENGTH_MSG: Must be at least 2 characters long.
PROVIDER_NAME_AND_OTHERS.FIRST_NAME_MIN_LENGTH_MSG: Must be at least 2 characters long.

FACILITY.LABEL: Enter Facility Name
FACILITY.NAME_MIN_LENGTH_MSG: Must be at least 2 characters long.

SEARCH_RESULTS.TITLE: Please select to add.
SEARCH_RESULTS.NO_RESULT_MSG: Sorry, There is no provider found!

RESULT.PROVIDER_ALREADY_ADDED_LABEL: This Provider has already in your provider list.

DELETE_DIALOG.TITLE: Delete Provider
DELETE_DIALOG.CONTENT: Are you sure you want to delete this provider?

ADD_DIALOG.TITLE: Add Selected Providers
ADD_DIALOG.CONTENT: Are you sure you want to add the selected providers?
